spec_data.Name: perl-MooX-Locale-Passthrough
spec_data.Description:
MooX::Locale::Passthrough is made to allow CPAN modules use translator API
without adding heavy dependencies (external software) or requirements
(operating resulting solution).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:44:05 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provide API used in translator modules without translating
